<s> Mechanix </s> '''The Four Horsemen''' é uma música (supostamente) dos mestres do Metal ''mainstream'' [[Metallica]]. Teorias da conspiração revelam que essa música é o motivo do Metallica e [[Megadeth]] não se darem bem.

== Composição ==
A música foi composta por Mustaine enquanto ele cheirava ''[[Cocaína|um pó do bom]]'' com canudinho de refrigerante. Depois que <s> Mustang </s> Mustaine levou um pé da bunda do Metallica ele viu sua música ser alterada pelo malvados e FDPs [[James Hetfield|Jaiminho Retofirme]] e [[Lars Ulrich|Laércio Uirixe]]; a letra havia sido modificada, o andamento se tornou mais lento e foi adicionada uma [[gay|passagem melódica]] tocada por [[Kirk Hammett|Quiquinho Hamlet]]. A versão original de Mustaine ficou conhecida como ''Mechanix'' e a versão ''bananation'' do Metallica ficou conhecida como ''The Four Horsemen''; que fala sobre os Cavaleiros do <s> Zodíaco </s> [[Apocalipse]].
